entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Woodstock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -1.1°C

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 8. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low zero.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain showers in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 late in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
